summary: SummaryThe Buttah Vibe Brush delivers high-vibe effective facial cleansing that gently exfoliates, eliminates dullness and dead skin cells and is water resistant, designed to be used in the shower.
details: DetailsBenefitsRecommended for all skin typesHigh-vibe effective facial cleansing that gently exfoliates, eliminates dullness and dead skin cellsFeaturesWater resistant, designed to be used in the showerThe sonic pulsation delicately massages skin, stimulating and energizing skin on a deeper levelPores look less visible and skin's tone and texture is improvedItem 2585287How To UseDampen face with water. Apply the Buttah Cleanser directly onto the Buttah Vibe Brush. Cleanse with sonic pulses for 1 to 2 minutes while massaging the brush in upward motion to energize the skin. Rinse and pat dry. Follow up with Buttah Vitamin C Serum, Facial Shea Butter, or CocoShea Cream.
how_to_use: Dampen face with water. Apply the Buttah Cleanser directly onto the Buttah Vibe Brush. Cleanse with sonic pulses for 1 to 2 minutes while massaging the brush in upward motion to energize the skin. Rinse and pat dry. Follow up with Buttah Vitamin C Serum, Facial Shea Butter, or CocoShea Cream.

reviews.headline: Brush too heavy for small base.
reviews.comments: Purchased in december and didnt even use for a full month till base completely snapped off during use.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: I thought this thing would be too bulky and awkward for my face due to the size however it's not! The vibration speed feels nice on the skin. Doesn't hurt or is too aggressive. The brand had a sale so I bought two and gave one to my sister. She loves it too!

reviews.headline: Clarisonic Mia Died
reviews.comments: I have been a Clarisonic Mia facial brush system user for years and the company went out of business and finally my Mia died. I been using Buttah now for 2 years and love it but didn't buy the brush. Well I did and have been using it for a month. I do love it. It's a bit big and hard to move around my face like my Mia, but it does get the job done.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments: do you need it, no. but if you wanna jazz up your routine it's amazing and leaves u with a clean feeling that is amazing ! I would recommend 100% but it is not necessary at all your hands do just as well.

reviews.headline: Great, Except For The Noisr
reviews.comments: Great facial cleansing brush. The vibration is relaxing. Only downside is.the.noise! The batteries inside vibrate and make this loud, obnoxious noise. Imagine a giant mosquito buzzing in your ear.

reviews.headline: Better than the rest!
reviews.comments: I tried all kinds of cleansing brushes. The price and quality is amazing with this one. I love that the brush is big and covers more area. What made me buy it was that I can replace the batteries at ease.

reviews.headline: Impressed
reviews.comments:
This was an impulse buy and I don't regret it. 
My face feels and looks so clean when I use it. 
I wish I could get into the nose area a little better though.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I used this for the first time today, and it's amazing. So amazing I'm buying 2 more for my daughters. My skin doesn't feel bumpy, and it's incredibly soft. After one use!!!!!

media.headline: This is great for my image
Had two and both stopped working
media.caption: Older on left Newer on right

media.headline: Had two and both stopped working

faceoff_positive.comments: I have had dark spots and uneven skin tone for years and my skin is finally looking like one color from using the vibe brush with an exfoliant. Even when I start to get spots from popping a pimple or something, the vitamin c serum will clear right up. This stuff is amazing quality! I can't use the face wash because I am allergic to coconut, but my regimen is to use a wash and exfoliant with the brush, the toner, vitamin c serum and shea butter moisturizer. Combined, they are game changers!
faceoff_positive.headline: The most even skin tone I have had in years!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have had two of these . I had the original it lasted a little over a year . I got a new one a few months ago ( supposed to be improved ) and now it has quit working as well and I will definitely try something different. Also Both were real finicky when traveling with them. They would never work when I reached my destination no matter how I packed it and  I would have to take the batteries in and out a few times and bang it lol to get it to work .
faceoff_negative.headline: Had two and both stopped working
